wikipedia_page.main: Barry Friend (born 13 October 1951) is an English former professional footballer who played in the Football League for Fulham. He also played non-league football in the London area for clubs including Leatherhead, Wimbledon, with whom he won the Southern League title in 1977, Slough Town, Carshalton Athletic and Tooting & Mitcham United. He played as a Winger or midfielder. In the summer of 1976, he played abroad in Canada's National Soccer League with Ottawa Tigers.
